paper_abstract: We introduce three spectral regularization methods for solving a general sideways parabolic equation. For these three spectral regularization methods, we give some stability error estimates with optimal order under a-priori and a-posteriori regularization parameter choice rules. Numerical results show that these spectral methods are effective. Crown Copyright (C) 2008 Published by Elsevier B.V. on behalf of IMACS. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Spectral regularization methods for solving a sideways parabolic equation within the framework of regularization theory
